column4: please help! I can't setup an lvm logical volume... heres the error I get: http://rafb.net/p/qbbCFq63.html
I use raid0 so it is loaded...
63 device-mapper is one of the things if that's what you looked for...
have you set up vg at all yet ?
I'm talking about pvcreate vgcreate that you need to do before you can lvcreate
I think I gave you the paste for vgdisplay...
oh, my bad... anyway, yes - I did
do I need to do anything to have it available every boot, or will it work?
most likely the startup scripts will find it for you. the fedora ones do anyhow
